# childWindows

**Instance Property**

An array of the window’s attached child windows.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var childWindows: [NSWindow]? { get }
```

## Managing Attached Windows

- **addChildWindow(_:ordered:)**: Adds a given window as a child window of the window.
- **removeChildWindow(_:)**: Detaches a given child window from the window.
- **parent**: The parent window to which the window is attached as a child.
